## Penguin Size and Mass by Sex and Species

```{r}
library(palmerpenguins)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

df <- palmerpenguins::penguins

head(df)
```

```{r}
df |>
    group_by(species, sex) |>
    summarise(
        across(
            where(is.numeric),
            ~mean(., na.rm = TRUE)
        )
    )
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = df, aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = body_mass_g, color = species)) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_smooth(method = "lm")
```
